original_text: He hath said, which heard the words of God, and knew the knowledge of the most High, which saw the vision of the Almighty, falling into a trance, but having his eyes open:
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀을 듣는 자가 말하며 지극히 높으신 자의 지식을 아는 자, 전능자의 환상을 보는 자, 엎드려서 눈을 뜬 자가 말하기를

sentences.original_text: He hath said, which heard the words of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 말했으니 하나님의 말씀을 들은 자라

sentences.original_text: and knew the knowledge of the most High
which saw the vision of the Almighty
